messages: 😱 Lost ₹16.4 LAKHS keeping money in savings. Your fear costs you wealth. Reply BEAT to defeat inflation
☕ ₹10 chai teaches ₹10Cr lesson. Chaiwala owns 3 shops, MBA owns 0. Consistency > Degrees. Reply START
🏆 My maid teaches at IIM now. ₹200 SIP → ₹8.7L → Bought flat. Your excuse? Reply WIN
